system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Lathe-Pattern Breacher Servitor
Apt: None
system.descriptionText: Lathe-Pattern Breacher Servitor Primary Function. Servitor Comrade begins drilling through an obstruction, and will continue to do so until told otherwise or until successfully drilling a hole through the obstruction. Drilling 5cm or Rock per Round, or 3m per 5 minutes. Double or more Distance for soft matierals (EG:Wood/loose stone), Halve or more for harder like fortified stone/metal. Hole is 2m high, 1m wide, can collapse if weak material.
